com.bindingofnewton.game.assets

Class SoundHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bindingofnewton.game.assets.SoundHandler

  • public class SoundHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all sounds and music in the game. Like AssetsHandler also a Singleton-Pattern. Instance gets created at start of the game, because loading sounds and music needs a lot of time.
